SENT.plain: A 1 yr old male Estrela mountain dog was evaluated as a part of a screening program for dilated cardiomyopathy
The dog came from a family with a history of dilated cardiomyopathy but was asymptomatic
Occult dilated cardiomyopathy and sino-atrial dysfunction were diagnosed based on echocardiography and electrocardiography
These two disorders may be associated given that related dogs have been diagnosed with the same disorders
The dog has remained asymptomatic for 4 years following initial evaluation
